extendedInfo.description: Automatically switch between ring tone, vibrate and silent depending on location and time of day. Different places can have different radius and time. Separate lists for GPS and network-based locations, as they don't always overlap.Working Beta.English and Swedish.

reviews.title: Needs fine tuned.
reviews.comment: My locations all just disappeared. Disables when I restart my phone. Needs ability to set location from the map. Needs to work all the time. Hard to trust. Great idea though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful, but the separate lists for cell and gps locations has caused problems for me before when I only set up a location in one side.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: would be great if it could be configured for low volume ring
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: How am I supposed to setup desired places? It wouldn\'t allow me to apply it but only for present location!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Been looking for something that works with GPS for work and church. This works great!
reviews.author: Thomas Carter
